Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke about. A ple=
asure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
  ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturd=
ay, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


  Deemos looked at t=
he CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

  "Maxima=
l base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laughed.

  "Who are =
you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

  Gangon's spark is still waiting.

  Artist run=
s around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercises him. H=
e runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into the mount=
ain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pass throu=
gh his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

  "Oh, that was some blow, but I'll g=
o with the flow." Artist said.

  "Plintissa? Where are you my love? Come o=
n out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered that she was in the d=
esert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran to Plintissa. Plin=
tissa looked up at him coldly.

  "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? F=
or me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew i=
nto Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

  "Do m=
e a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

  "=
Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both =
laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

  Dracona held up her=
 scanning device in front of Scorponok's face.

  "I can find that device I=
 lost." Dracona said.

  "Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece =
of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok wit=
h big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

  =
The Radicons sat there still...

------------------------------------
